full_threads.body:
Hi Sarah, 

Thanks for the email/call. 

Confirming we have:

1. Added the social media platform options under each tile. 
2. Reduced the size of Women and MS
3. Adding of anchor links

You can review the updates here: https://www.msaustralia.org.au/?page_id=34677&preview=true

Please confirm we can go live with the page and update the tile on: https://www.msaustralia.org.au/events/

We will also action the redirect request.
@jaime Can I please get you to jump in on this again?

Hi Support Team and Heath

Thank you so much for this.

Firstly, can we put back in each social media platform under each tile - Facebook, Twitter and LinkedIn - not just the one "Save image and share". Heath had put icons for each platform in at Day 1 but they've disappeared. Please consult with Heath as he chose a great colour each for each icon. I would like three platforms under each tile if possible, please. It should look like this (see below) so that users can download each tile for each platform to share. As mentioned, I loaded all images to your Dropbox yesterday.



Can you make this image smaller please.



Can you please add anchors to each day from here:



Thank you. If this could be completed early in the morning (say by 10am?) if possible. I will be in touch re: redirects etc.

Thank you again for your amazing help.

Regards

Sarah

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Hi Support Team


Heath and I met this afternoon and he kindly mapped out the page for Women's Health Week 2022 which I will need to make live on Friday, 26 August.


https://www.msaustralia.org.au/wp-admin/post.php?post=34677&action=edit


Heath offered the assistance of the Support Team as I am pushed for time. If possible, can this be completed by tomorrow at 1pm? I was hoping to do this myself but have just received a media call which will have to take priority for me tomorrow morning.


I have uploaded the attached Word. document which is the content for this page and am happy to talk you through this if need be.


This afternoon I uploaded to your Dropbox the images needed for the page (noting you will need one image, not three - Facebook, Twitter and LinkedIn - for each Daily Topic/Call to action). For some reason, after uploading, the file name extension at Heath's end has changed from "MS-WHW1_LinkedIn.jpg" to "MS-WHW1_LinkedIn Sarah Morrison.jpg". When uploading to Media in our website, we would need to remove my name from the filename extension please. Heath used the Facebook image here when creating this landing page. You will see that users can download each image once they click on the social media icons.







Once live, I would like a redirect put in place from this "Hub" https://events.msaustralia.org.au/whw2021/ to https://www.msaustralia.org.au/womens-health-week-2022


We will also need to change the image here https://www.msaustralia.org.au/events/ to reflect WHW 2022 (see attached images). We will need to change this image and link. I am hoping the 720x410 image attached will work in its place on Friday.





Thank you for your help. Please do not hesitate ton contact me on 0400 477 527 if need be.


Regards




Sarah
